title: Renders void exclusive brokerage agreements for sale of certain residential property in N.Y. city made hereafter
summary: Renders void and unenforceable agreements between real estate brokers and sellers of residential real property other than multiple dwellings in cities of one million or more persons where the asking price for the sale of the property is less than one million dollars, and pursuant to which such broker is designated as the exclusive agent for the sale or advertisement of the availability of the property; applies to agreements made after effective date of the bill.
